  • Method Details

    • onActionAddProductAddPart

      void onActionAddProductAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds selected part to product's associated parts list. Alerts user with warning if no part is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - -> 'onActionAddProductAddPart' button pressed.

    • onActionCancelProduct

      void onActionCancelProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches view to 'Main.fxml'.
      Parameters:
      event - -> 'onActionCancelProduct' button pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - if location cannot be determined.

    • onActionRemoveAssociatedPartFromProduct

      void onActionRemoveAssociatedPartFromProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes a selected part from product's associated parts list. Confirms removal of part from list with confirmation prompt. Alerts user with warning if no part is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - -> 'onActionRemoveAssociatedPartFromProduct' button pressed

    • onActionSearchParts

      void onActionSearchParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Searches 'addProductTblViewTop' for either matching ID or Name (partial or full.) Method filters displayed list by input. If there is no matching part, method displays information alert stating no matching parts could be found. If search bar is empty, table view displays full list of parts.
      Parameters:
      event - -> 'onActionSearchParts' button pressed

    • addProductTblViewTopReset

      void addProductTblViewTopReset(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Resets addProductTblViewTop to display all parts if search bar is empty.
      Parameters:
      event - -> 'addProductSearchTxt' is empty

    • onActionSaveProduct

      void onActionSaveProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Sets parameter variables as values collected from 'AddProduct.fxml'. Creates a new 'Product' using aforementioned parameter variables. Adds any associated parts selected from addProductTblViewTop to new product's associated parts list. Calls 'Inventory.addProduct' method to add new part to allProducts list. Switches view to 'Main.fxml'.
      Parameters:
      event - -> 'onActionSaveProduct' button pressed.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if input fields contain inappropriate characters.
      IOException - if location cannot be determined.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes table views for 'AddProduct.fxml'.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - -> an absolute URL to initialize 'AddProduct.fxml'
